scripts.generate-api: if exist src\gen rmdir /s /q src\gen && openapi-generator-cli generate -i http://localhost:5030/swagger/v1/swagger.json --generator-name typescript-fetch -o src\gen\api --config api.json && powershell -Command "& { $content = Get-Content 'src\gen\api\src\runtime.ts'; $content = $content[0..132] + @( '    protected async request(context: RequestOpts, initOverrides?: RequestInit | InitOverrideFunction): Promise<Response> {', '        const { url, init } = await this.createFetchParams(context, initOverrides);', '        const response = await this.fetchApi(url, init);', '        return response;', '    }' ) + $content[142..($content.Length - 1)]; $content | Set-Content 'src\gen\api\src\runtime.ts'; }"
